mapper.select: select date_format(create_time, '%Y-%m') as create_time from article where is_published = true group by date_format(create_time, '%Y-%m') order by create_time desc

select id, title, thumbnail, date_format(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as create_time from article where date_format(create_time, '%Y-%m') = #{date} and is_published = true order by create_time desc
select id, title, thumbnail, create_time from article where is_published = true and is_recommend = true order by rand() limit ${count}

select a.id, a.title, a.thumbnail, a.description, a.create_time, a.update_time, a.category_id, a.views, a.words, a.read_time, a.is_top, d.name category_name from article as a left join category as d on a.category_id = d.id
left join article_tag as b on a.id = b.article_id left join tag as c on b.tag_id = c.id
and c.id in
${tagId}
and a.category_id = ${queryCond.categoryId}
and a.title like concat('%',#{queryCond.keyword},'%')
and a.is_published = true
group by a.id order by is_top desc ,create_time desc
